text:
Senior Frontend Developer at Canal Digital|Oslo, Norway|ONSITE| VISA

Do you want to be responsible for Canal Digital's Front End Architecture? We are seeking a skilled developer with a good eye for design and UX. As Senior Frontend developer you will work closely with our web development and design teams to develop excellent, modern web solutions, in order to give our customers and potential customerâ€™s great UX and increase conversion rates and customer self-service. You will be a part of a small, diverse team as well as cooperating with other departments of the company. Canal Digital is a Nordic pay TV and internet service provider.

Check out the job ad here: https://www.telenor.com/career/vacant-positions/?jobid=J0622... Contact sumana.biswas@telenor.com for more info
